metadata.title: CVE-2020-18185 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: class.plx.admin.php in PluXml 5.7 allows attackers to execute arbitrary PHPcode by modify the configuration file in a linux environment.

criterions.comment: pluxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
